title: Define System Architecture
description: Design the overall structure of the PlasticToFuelConverter system, considering the conversion process, waste sorting, energy generation, and data logging.

title: Develop Plastic Waste Sorting Algorithm
description: Create an efficient algorithm to identify and sort different types of plastic waste for optimal conversion.

title: Design Conversion Process Hardware Interface
description: Design the user interface for controlling the conversion process, including temperature, pressure, and other relevant parameters.

title: Implement Conversion Process Control Logic
description: Develop the software logic that controls the conversion process based on user input and collected data.

title: Set Up Data Collection and Storage System
description: Create a system for logging data about waste input, conversion process parameters, energy output, and other relevant metrics.

title: Test PlasticToFuelConverter System
description: Conduct rigorous testing of the entire PlasticToFuelConverter system, ensuring efficient conversion, data logging, and user-friendly interface.
dependencies: Set Up Data Collection and Storage System
